44336671.review:
Played the hell out of the game during the Dreadful NEXON NA Days. I still love this game and the devs love the players!  With active streams and funny ass videos they do for the community. Even though you cant link steam to neople account(yet) It is still worth playing on steam! You can see the love they are trying to spread from the korean version to the rest of the world. The classes are diverse and well balanced(mostly....fuck Priests..)
The new story update allows me to actually participate in a campaign that makes you a major part of the story unlike most mmo's that just have you participating with a mass of other players to fight under one leader blah blah blah stuff.. You meet legends of past, THEN fight with them to make your legend even greater than theirs! 
The combat system is fun as fuck and harkens back to old arcade style fighting we all grew up with(unless you are born past the 2000's). Each class has 4 or more subclasses you lock into after reaching a certain level at the beginning of a new journey(with the exception of Dark Knight and Creator who are lore based classes that do not have subclasses, those classes are unlocked after level 70-75 for any character you raised to that level.) Each subclass can go under an upgrade called AWAKENING which basically fucks everything over with even more over the top skills to offer than you had before(go through the scenario quests to easily unlock the first awakening)
Want to be an edglord shadow man BOOM Avenger Subclass, want to be a wicked blood thirsty monster BOOM Berserker Subclass, Want to nuke a fucker that did nothing wrong BOOM Launcher subclasses. Want the FBI to knock the fuck out of your doors and windows BOOM Mage class.
Another amazing part of the game is the soundtrack, can be smooth and calm, to wicked and heart pounding. Even the character creation screen welcomes you with an amazing song!

 You dont have to worry about play to win, Its pay to look fucking fabulous. You can buy cosmetics via the cash shop OR the Community market place with gold you earn from doing almost anything. The prices can be rather high, but play through normally and you are bound to make hundreds of thousands of gold within hours. You can also sell alot of items you pick up, you might get lucky and pick up something worth loads of gold on Auction hall, so check items value there often.
The devs also make sure to keep thing exciting with CONSTANT EVENTS. It is almost rare to not have more than 2 events going on during any play session.

Some cons that come to mind is:
 -The Fatigue system, which is a bar that counts down to how many dungeon rooms you go through, once that bar is depleted your hero will be to exhausted to continue onwards until the next daily login. You can delay this with FP potions to restore some Fatigue so you can continue on playing with that character. Early on can be tiring but you can buy these with using milage points you get for completing optimal dungeons, they build up rather fast the more characters your play with in a day. 
-Player chest storage- Needs premium currency (cera) to upgrade. But this can be countered at level 60+ when you buy the account vault which is a universal storage for all characters. The upgrade components can be bought on the auction hall for gold rather easy!
-Occasional crashing, They are working on it, just can be a fucking pain when it happens, only happened twice so far in my steam and neople play times.
-Cannot purchase premium currency through steam...UNLESS you hit level 85 and do second awakening class, sometimes that might not even unlock it and might have to register a goblin security tab and google authenticator. So even if you want to buy something you got to work towards it for quite a bit.
-Lost treasures...fuck em....but been here since nexon days and it is a risky way to make tens of millions of gold on auction hall. You can earn keys through dungeons normally, but good lucky getting rng to have them drop. But hey...they are free keys and might get lucky opening a LT..

-Tokens...tokens are what you use to revive when you go down in a dungeon. They are a premium aqquired items (occasionally aquired through events or LT) IF you use what you have its going to be a hard fought battle against what is beating you into the dirt.

Lastly - Kiri.....The Destroyer of all your Shit... Using her is kinda madatory for good gear and damage output for items...but beware....The higher you go...the higher the chance you aint gonna get that item back...

There are many other things I may have forgotten to mention but I am to busy Summoning a dragon to do a fucking orbital beam cannon on a boss that talked shit to me..
